verses.name: 1 Chronicles 6:48
verses.text: Their brethren also the Levites were appointed unto all manner of service of the tabernacle of the house of God.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 6:49
verses.text: But Aaron and his sons offered upon the altar of the burnt offering, and on the altar of incense, and were appointed for all the work of the place most holy, and to make an atonement for Israel, according to all that Moses the servant of God had commanded.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 6:50
verses.text: And these are the sons of Aaron; Eleazar his son, Phinehas his son, Abishua his son,

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 6:51
verses.text: Bukki his son, Uzzi his son, Zerahiah his son,
